item.title: 48th District Court
item.subtitle: Hours: Monday - Friday 8:30am - 4:30pm. Drop box located near the front entrance. Items placed in the drop box after 4:00 p.m., will be posted as received on the Court's next business day.
item.description: Trials within the federal court system – both civil and criminal. Documents, pleadings, signed waivable tickets or any other filings may be submitted in-person, by mail, or deposited in the Court's drop box.
